feed.subtitle: App Store Discounts - Made with love by appstore-discounts(https://github.com/appstore-discounts/appstore-discounts) feedId:99063474310237184+userId:73658201673997312 feedId:157008924688563200+userId:73658201673997312

entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.summary: Notepad Pro+ Advanced Tools: â‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º49,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼šâ‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º49,99 [â‚º49,99 ~ â‚º249,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼šâ‚º49,99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Raiders Map
entry.summary:
Raider Mk. 3: â‚º1.499,99 â†’ â‚º499,99
Raider Mk. 1: â‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º49,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Raider Mk. 3ï¼šâ‚º1.499,99 â†’ â‚º499,99 [â‚º499,99 ~ â‚º1.499,99]
  • Raider Mk. 1ï¼šâ‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º49,99 [â‚º49,99 ~ â‚º249,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Raider Mk. 2ï¼šâ‚º499,99
  • Raider Mk. 3ï¼šâ‚º499,99
  • Raider Mk. 1ï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • Raider Weeklyï¼šâ‚º99,99

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º99,99 â†’ â‚º79,99 [â‚º79,99 ~ â‚º99,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º79,99

Application Description

SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure. IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community! Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer. THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches. FEATURES LIST â–¶Two Player Co-Op In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. Youâ€™ll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication! â–¶Challenging Collaborative Puzzles Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes. â–¶Unravel a Thrilling Story Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga. â–¶Explore Illustrated Worlds Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels. â–¶Draw onâ€¦ Everything! You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: TRINITY TRIGGER

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º249,99

Application Description

ã€€ã€€ã€€[Caution] Before purchasing or using this application, please be sure to read the [Notes on this application] at the bottom of the page. As Cyan, a young man burdened by the gods with the mantle of Warrior of Chaos and an inevitable clash against the Warrior of Order, players will set out on a grand adventure to defy fate and save Trinitia. Cyan and his companions Elise and Zantis are accompanied by strange creatures known as Triggers that can transform into eight types of weapons, and players can switch freely between the three characters to implement a solo combat strategy Together, they will write a new destiny. Master the Weapons of the Gods Solve puzzles and defeat enemies traverse the dungeons of each Arma, towers made from the fallen weapons of the gods. Seek Out Trinitiaâ€™s Mysteries Reveal hidden passages by exploring every last bit of Trinitiaâ€™s diverse biomes. Chat with townsfolk for clues to uncover the heavily guarded secrets held in these forests, deserts, snowfields, and more. Change the Tide of Battle Make expert use of the Weapon Wheel in battle to change between eight weapon types on the fly. Every enemy has a weaknessâ€”finding and exploiting it is the key to victory. A Generational Role-Playing Epic Trinity Trigger was inspired by the iconic RPGs of yesteryear, but its accessible and rewarding gameplay incorporates modern flourishes to make it an exciting new adventure for players of all ages. [Notes on this application] â–¼â–³â–¼ Operating Environment â–¼â–³â–¼ iOS 12.0 or later *Only officially released operating systems are supported. We do not guarantee that you will be able to play the game comfortably. â–¼â–³â–¼ Recommended Devices â–¼â–³â–¼ iPhone 11 or later, iPad 7th generation or later Internal memory (RAM): 2GB or more â–¼â–³â–¼ Recommended Play â–¼â–³â–¼ This application has an auto-save function, However, in order to avoid unexpected situations, it is recommended to â€œsave oftenâ€. Starting the application while multiple applications are running may cause unstable operation. To ensure stable play, we recommend that you play the game with other apps down. â–¼â–³â–¼ Disclaimer â–¼â–³â–¼ 1. Please note that support will not be provided for operation on OS versions other than the supported OS versions. 2. due to customer usage conditions and model-specific factors, even with a compatible model, operation may be unstable or may not work properly. 3. Even if â€œiOSXXX or higherâ€ is listed as the supported OS version, it does not necessarily mean that the latest version is supported. 4. It may take some time to start the game after the application is launched depending on the model. 5. A frame may appear on the screen depending on the model. Refunds (including exchanges for other products or services) will not be accepted for any reason. Â© FURYU Corporation.

entry.content:

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º299,99

In-App Purchases

  • Kickstarter Editionï¼šâ‚º0,00

Application Description

Lawgivers II is a political sandbox game that features multiple electoral systems, approve/reject bills and govern a country. Start out your career from the very bottom, and perhaps one day, lead your nation to become the most influential in the world. â—‰ Discover diverse political systems across dozens of countries, ranging from first-past-the-post to proportional dâ€™Hondt representation. â—‰ Control a politician within a party and choose to play for national prestige, party influence, or personal gain. â—‰ Propose, debate, and vote on bills in the plenary that impact the economy, happiness, and global stability. â—‰ Forge ties with organizations, negotiate deals with other parties, or unite in a coalition. â—‰ Make use of corruption and other shady activities to raise black money or to pass controversial laws in Parliament or Congress. â—‰ No ads. No microtransactions. A complete experience. One purchase â€” endless replayability.
